languages.text: "Послушай, элантах. Взор детей Азуриана проникает глубже, чем взгляд мон-кай. И я вижу всю тяжесть, что за время наших странствий скопилась в твоей душе. Я... вижу это. В твоих движениях. В наклоне головы. В том, как сменился твой запах. Если ты мне позволишь..." {n}, — Ирлиэт впервые звучит столь неуверенно и... виновато, -{/n} "Я помогу тебе сбросить этот груз с плеч и очистить душу и разум от волнений".

"Look, elantach. The gaze of a Child of Asuryan can penetrate deeper than a mon-keigh's. And I can see all the heaviness that has accumulated in your soul during our travels. I... see it. In your gestures. In the tilt of your head. In the change in your scent. If you will allow me..." {n}This is the first time you have heard Yrliet sound so indecisive and... guilty.{/n} "I will help you to cast off this burden and cleanse your soul and mind of worry."
languages.original_text: "Послушай, элантах. Взор детей Азуриана проникает глубже, чем взгляд мон-кай. И я вижу всю тяжесть, что за время наших странствий скопилась в твоей душе. Я... вижу это. В твоих движениях. В наклоне головы. В том, как сменился твой запах. Если ты мне позволишь..." {n}, — Ирлиэт впервые звучит столь неуверенно и... виновато, -{/n} "Я помогу тебе сбросить этот груз с плеч и очистить душу и разум от волнений".

traits.locale_text: "Look, elantach. The gaze of the children of Asuryan can reach further than mon-keigh's. And I can see all the ballast that had accumulated in your soul during our travels. I... see it. In your gestures. In the tilt of your head. In the way your odour has changed. If you will allow me..." {n}, — this is the first time that you hear Yrliet voice sound so indecisive and... guilty, —{/n} "I will help you to get this weight off your shoulders and cleanse your soul and mind of anxiety."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “听我说，外界人，阿苏焉之子的目光比猴子的目光更有洞察力。在我们一路的旅途中，我注意到你的灵魂正在变得越来越沉重。你的手势，你转头的幅度，你身上气味的变化……我能够看到这一点。如果你愿意的话……”{n}这还是你第一次听到伊莉耶特的声音如此踌躇，如此……充满负罪感。{/n}“我可以帮助你摆脱重担，远离忧虑、净化灵魂。”
languages.original_text: "Look, elantach. The gaze of a Child of Asuryan can penetrate deeper than a mon-keigh's. And I can see all the heaviness that has accumulated in your soul during our travels. I... see it. In your gestures. In the tilt of your head. In the change in your scent. If you will allow me..." {n}This is the first time you have heard Yrliet sound so indecisive and... guilty.{/n} "I will help you to cast off this burden and cleanse your soul and mind of worry."

traits.locale_text: “听我说，外界人，阿苏焉之子的目光比猴子的目光更有洞察力。在我们一路的旅途中，我注意到你的灵魂正在变得越来越沉重。你的手势，你转头的幅度，你身上气味的变化……我能够看到这一点。如果你愿意的话……”{n}这还是你第一次听到伊莉耶特的声音如此踌躇，如此……充满负罪感。{/n}“我可以帮助你摆脱重担，远离忧虑、净化灵魂。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Mira, elantach. Los ojos de un hijo de Asuryan son más perspicaces que los de un mon-keigh. Y puedo ver la pesada carga que se ha acumulado en tu alma durante nuestros viajes. Yo... la veo. En tus gestos. En cómo ladeas la cabeza. En que hueles diferente. Si me lo permites...». {n}Es la primera vez que oyes a Yrliet tan indecisa y... culpable.{/n} «Te ayudaré a liberarte de esa carga y purgar tu alma y tu mente de todas sus tribulaciones».
languages.original_text: "Look, elantach. The gaze of a Child of Asuryan can penetrate deeper than a mon-keigh's. And I can see all the heaviness that has accumulated in your soul during our travels. I... see it. In your gestures. In the tilt of your head. In the change in your scent. If you will allow me..." {n}This is the first time you have heard Yrliet sound so indecisive and... guilty.{/n} "I will help you to cast off this burden and cleanse your soul and mind of worry."

traits.locale_text: «Mira, elantach. Los ojos de un hijo de Asuryan son más perspicaces que los de un mon-keigh. Y puedo ver la pesada carga que se ha acumulado en tu alma durante nuestros viajes. Yo... la veo. En tus gestos. En cómo ladeas la cabeza. En que hueles diferente. Si me lo permites...». {n}Es la primera vez que oyes a Yrliet tan indecisa y... culpable.{/n} «Te ayudaré a liberarte de esa carga y purgar tu alma y tu mente de todas sus tribulaciones».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Écoutez, elantach. Le regard d'un enfant d'Asuryan perçoit bien plus que celui d'un mon-keigh, et je vois que le fardeau accumulé lors de nos voyages pèse lourdement sur votre âme. Je le... perçois clairement. Dans chacun de vos gestes. Dans votre manière de pencher la tête. Dans le parfum de votre corps. Si vous me le permettez... » {n}C'est la première fois que vous voyez Yrliet aussi hésitante et... coupable.{/n} « J'aimerais vous aider à vous libérer de ce poids et à purifier votre âme. »
languages.original_text: "Look, elantach. The gaze of a Child of Asuryan can penetrate deeper than a mon-keigh's. And I can see all the heaviness that has accumulated in your soul during our travels. I... see it. In your gestures. In the tilt of your head. In the change in your scent. If you will allow me..." {n}This is the first time you have heard Yrliet sound so indecisive and... guilty.{/n} "I will help you to cast off this burden and cleanse your soul and mind of worry."

traits.locale_text: « Écoutez, elantach. Le regard d'un enfant d'Asuryan perçoit bien plus que celui d'un mon-keigh, et je vois que le fardeau accumulé lors de nos voyages pèse lourdement sur votre âme. Je le... perçois clairement. Dans chacun de vos gestes. Dans votre manière de pencher la tête. Dans le parfum de votre corps. Si vous me le permettez... » {n}C'est la première fois que vous voyez Yrliet aussi hésitante et... coupable.{/n} « J'aimerais vous aider à vous libérer de ce poids et à purifier votre âme. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Hört mir zu, Elantach. Der Blick eines Kindes von Asuryan kann tiefer vordringen als der eines Chem-Pan-Sey. Und ich sehe all die Schwere, die sich während unserer Reisen in Eurer Seele angesammelt hat. Ich ... sehe sie. In Euren Gesten. In Eurer Kopfhaltung. In der Veränderung Eures Geruchs. Falls Ihr gestattet ..." {n}Zum ersten Mal klingt Yrliet derart unentschlossen und ... schuldbewusst.{/n} "Ich kann Euch helfen, diese Bürde abzulegen und Euren Geist und Eure Seele von Besorgnis zu befreien."
languages.original_text: "Look, elantach. The gaze of a Child of Asuryan can penetrate deeper than a mon-keigh's. And I can see all the heaviness that has accumulated in your soul during our travels. I... see it. In your gestures. In the tilt of your head. In the change in your scent. If you will allow me..." {n}This is the first time you have heard Yrliet sound so indecisive and... guilty.{/n} "I will help you to cast off this burden and cleanse your soul and mind of worry."

traits.locale_text: "Hört mir zu, Elantach. Der Blick eines Kindes von Asuryan kann tiefer vordringen als der eines Chem-Pan-Sey. Und ich sehe all die Schwere, die sich während unserer Reisen in Eurer Seele angesammelt hat. Ich ... sehe sie. In Euren Gesten. In Eurer Kopfhaltung. In der Veränderung Eures Geruchs. Falls Ihr gestattet ..." {n}Zum ersten Mal klingt Yrliet derart unentschlossen und ... schuldbewusst.{/n} "Ich kann Euch helfen, diese Bürde abzulegen und Euren Geist und Eure Seele von Besorgnis zu befreien."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「いいか、エランタ。アシュリアンの御子の眼は、モン＝ケイのそれよりも深くまで視ることができる。旅の間にお前の魂に蓄積された重荷が視える。我には…視えるのだ。お前の仕草、頭の傾き、香りの変化に。もしお前が許可してくれるなら…」{n}ユリエットがこれほど優柔不断な…罪悪感に満ちた声を出すのを聞いたのは初めてかもしれない。{/n}「その重荷を捨て、お前の魂と心を心配事から浄化する手助けをしよう」
languages.original_text: "Look, elantach. The gaze of a Child of Asuryan can penetrate deeper than a mon-keigh's. And I can see all the heaviness that has accumulated in your soul during our travels. I... see it. In your gestures. In the tilt of your head. In the change in your scent. If you will allow me..." {n}This is the first time you have heard Yrliet sound so indecisive and... guilty.{/n} "I will help you to cast off this burden and cleanse your soul and mind of worry."

traits.locale_text: 「いいか、エランタ。アシュリアンの御子の眼は、モン＝ケイのそれよりも深くまで視ることができる。旅の間にお前の魂に蓄積された重荷が視える。我には…視えるのだ。お前の仕草、頭の傾き、香りの変化に。もしお前が許可してくれるなら…」{n}ユリエットがこれほど優柔不断な…罪悪感に満ちた声を出すのを聞いたのは初めてかもしれない。{/n}「その重荷を捨て、お前の魂と心を心配事から浄化する手助けをしよう」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Bak elantach. Bir Asuryan'ın Çocuğu'nun bakışları, mon-keigh bakışlarından çok daha derine inebilir. Yolculuklarımız sırasında ruhuna yerleşen ağırlığı görebiliyorum. Hareketlerinde, başını eğişinde, kokundaki değişimde görüyorum. İzin verirsen..." {n}Yrliet'i ilk kez bu kadar kararsız ve suçlu görüyorsun.{/n} "Bu yükü sırtından alıp ruhundaki ve zihnindeki endişeleri silmene yardım edebilirim."
languages.original_text: "Look, elantach. The gaze of a Child of Asuryan can penetrate deeper than a mon-keigh's. And I can see all the heaviness that has accumulated in your soul during our travels. I... see it. In your gestures. In the tilt of your head. In the change in your scent. If you will allow me..." {n}This is the first time you have heard Yrliet sound so indecisive and... guilty.{/n} "I will help you to cast off this burden and cleanse your soul and mind of worry."

traits.locale_text: "Bak elantach. Bir Asuryan'ın Çocuğu'nun bakışları, mon-keigh bakışlarından çok daha derine inebilir. Yolculuklarımız sırasında ruhuna yerleşen ağırlığı görebiliyorum. Hareketlerinde, başını eğişinde, kokundaki değişimde görüyorum. İzin verirsen..." {n}Yrliet'i ilk kez bu kadar kararsız ve suçlu görüyorsun.{/n} "Bu yükü sırtından alıp ruhun ve zihnindeki endişeleri silmene yardım edebilirim."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
